name: Cloud Sculpt
description:
An esoteric deep dive into the psyche. Or a game about sculpting clouds. One of the two.

"The greatest game of our century" - Forbes Magazine

"11/10" - Jim's Gardening Weekly

"No I will not give you a quote" - Mayor's office

Made for the  #NotThe48 game jam.

Music and audio by Zander Hulme, everything else (bar one asset, attribution included within) was by Kirk Winner (me)
